snippet: Britain's world number one men's tennis player Andy Murray won a record third BBC Sports Personality of the Year award on Sunday after claiming his second Wimbledon title and first ATP World Tour crown in a stellar 2016 season....
lead_paragraph: Britain's world number one men's tennis player Andy Murray won a record third BBC Sports Personality of the Year award on Sunday after claiming his second Wimbledon title and first ATP World Tour crown in a stellar 2016 season.

headline.print_headline: Murray Wins Record Third BBC Sports Award
headline.main: Murray Wins Record Third BBC Sports Award
